settings.heading_text: Rule the Ages, Dominate the Game
settings.desc: Elevate your empire-building and claim exclusive rewards in Civilization VII with HyperX.

settings.heading_text: Exclusive Digital Offer: Claim Your Banners of Glory
settings.desc: Claim your legacy in Civilization VII with two exclusive in-game banners, inspired by the power of ancient kingdoms and modern empires. Get them free when you purchase a keyboard or keyboard bundle!

settings.heading: Title with Description
settings.title: Redemption instructions:
settings.description_col_1:
1. In the game’s main menu, click "Collection". 
  2. Click "Redeem Code". 
  3. Enter your code and click "Redeem". 
  4. To access your in-game banners, click the profile badge in the top right corner, then click "Customization" and navigate to "Banners" and they will be there.

settings.heading: Title with Description
settings.title: Discover HyperX Keyboards Built for Strategy and Domination

settings.desc: The ultra-compact, tenkeyless keyboard featuring HyperX mechanical switches, the Alloy Origins Core offers the perfect balance of style, performance, and reliability. With three adjustable keyboard angles, it ensures your comfort during those marathon strategy sessions.

Precision and stability meet in this compact mechanical keyboard. Featuring an aircraft-grade aluminum body, the Alloy Origins remains rigid and steady even in the heat of war. Customize every key to suit your strategy using the powerful NGENUITY software.

The 75% keyboard, elevated for the ultimate personalization. The Alloy Rise 75 redefines mechanical gaming with its gasket-mounted design and unmatched customizability. Built for the strategist who demands both performance and expression in every keystroke.

settings.title: Explore Additional Gear Options for Your Empire
settings.subtitle: Whether you’re leading your armies to glory, navigating the diplomacy of a golden age, or expanding your borders to the ends of the world in Civilization VII, HyperX and OMEN have the tools to ensure you remain in control. Discover a full range of gear to enhance your strategy, and claim your exclusive in-game items as you build a civilization to stand the test of time.
